channel.title: Is there anything wrong with this autocast?

item.title: Is there anything wrong with this autocast?
item.dc:creator: @puresdeath puresdeath
item.description:
@puresdeath wrote:

if there is anythign wrong with it please tell me thanks and if not tell me whats whats good about it

// CLUE_01 public void clearclue(int cluestage) { clueid = clueid; } public void iceBarrage() { if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 4675) //Auto Ice Barrage { TurnPlayerTo(EnemyX, EnemyY); //iceBarrage(); animation(441, EnemyY, EnemyX); AnimationReset = true; updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; actionAmount++; teleportToX = absX; teleportToY = absY; hitDiff = 29 + misc.random(2); actionTimer = 2; setAnimation(1979); AnimationReset = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitDiff = hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].Killing[playerId] += hitDiff; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].updateRequired = true; server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].hitUpdateRequired = true; double TotalExp = 0; TotalExp = (double)(30000 * hitDiff); TotalExp = (double)(TotalExp * CombatExpRate); addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerMagic); if ((EnemyHP - hitDiff) < 0) { hitDiff = EnemyHP; } } }

Read full topic
item.source: Is there anything wrong with this autocast?
